course_description: Introduces fundamental issues in photography & visual thinking using 35mm film cameras & B/W film.  Topics: camera use, film developing, darkroom & printing skills, image selection & presentation, an overview of the history of photography, basic philosophy of photography, & interpretation of images.
prerequisites: FILM 101 or FILM_OX 101 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
